title: minerx110
author: minerx110
content: Hey guys! The prices of available ASICs I have in stock have now dropped below $3.6k (Lowest in 60 days) due to the drop in the price of BTC! These are hosted and preinstalled, available immediately. To know more, message or ask in the thread.

comments.author: crypto_curious
comments.body: Asking in the thread. As your opening post contains absolutely zero information. Not even a location.
